snippet: Tony Clark, a former first baseman, was on Tuesday named to succeed Michael Weiner, who died last month, as the union’s executive director.
abstract: Tony Clark, a former first baseman, is named to succeed Michael Weiner, who died last month, as the baseball player's association's executive director.
lead_paragraph: Tony Clark, a former first baseman, was on Tuesday named to succeed Michael Weiner, who died last month, as the union’s executive director.

headline.main: For the First Time, a Former Player Will Lead the Baseball Players’ Union
